website_summaries.verdict: Updated 11th edition that includes online digital flash cards, 9 full-length practice tests, and answer explanations.
pros: Detailed examples of real estate law, finance, and contracts
Explains vocabulary well so test takers have comprehensive understanding
Full-scale preparation with flash cards and mock exams to help in every phase of studying
Great for salespeople, brokers, and appraisers
cons: Very thin paper makes it hard to highlight without bleeding

customer_reviews.title: Great study tool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome detail in this book. It's to-the-point and explains things very well. My only complaint so far is that I do wish they included explanations to the quiz answers. Also, if you're serious about passing this exam, download an IOS app called "Real estate for dummies" . Not sure if they have it for android but probably. It's $10/ month with a 3 day free trial and has HUNDREDS of quiz questions ALL with explanations and they guy is actually pretty funny and keeps it interesting. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: kalyn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The book does not say which content is for what license. There is a different need for salespersons, brokers and appraisers, but I have to figure out what it is I need. The book does not explain the answers for quizzes. It claims there are sample tests, but those tests repeat the questions I got earlier at the end of chapters still without explanation. The biggest problem is that I don't know what I need to study. Also, some questions are out of nowhere - there is no mention of that content in the text. This book is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: egy_velemeny

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The best book I used while studying for my test! It was a perfect book to review when your cramming right before the test. I passed on my first try!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: left out information
customer_reviews.text: This book has nothing regarding supply, demand, market, factors that effect demand and supply, activities involved in real estate, characteristics of real property or factors that influence home ownership which are both covered in the basic online courses for TX and IL exam prep through other sources. Even RE has this in their online course materials. Pretty certain this book will be missing other information. Supply isn't even in the list of definitions covered in this book.
customer_reviews.author: GingyJAC

customer_reviews.title: Real estate exam study book
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thick book full of great information to help you pass your real estate licensing exam. Includes online help and support also. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Dean

customer_reviews.title: Helped me passed national test
customer_reviews.text: This book is absolutely amazing !! I failed the first time I took the test and was recommended to read this book . It throughly helped me understand the concept much more than my school text book .. I passed the test on my second attempt Thankyou Barron’s
customer_reviews.author: Ms K vereen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: Questions are not worded similarly to the real exam. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: lisa Nissman

customer_reviews.title: Extra info
customer_reviews.text: It contains info for both the agent and broker’s exam which should’ve been separate. I feel like I spent a lot of time on information that is not going to be on the exam but I really like the glossary section.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel Lynne Waite

customer_reviews.title: Best overview
customer_reviews.text: Should help in passing exam. There is no one in my state that offers a comprehensive study guide like this.
customer_reviews.author: Allison W. Thomas Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Passed first time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend. He passed his exam first time in FL after been studying with this book. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne G Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love the book it’s beautiful and l will be using it to study buy. Thank you, l really appreciate you getting it to me so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Real Estate study book
customer_reviews.text: This book helps break down all the terms and concepts that you need to know in the Real estate business!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great secondary resource
customer_reviews.text: Really simplifies all concepts. It was a great supplement to the real estate training program I bought online.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new book at a much cheaper price had I bought it from a bookstore.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review questions
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book lots of great information (;
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest, I’ve not even used this book. When it arrived, I looked at it and decided it was too overwhelming. I live in Florida and found the Florida specific study book to be much better. The paper in this book is so thin. If you wanted to highlight something it would likely bled through several pages. Honestly, don’t recommend it as it’s very general. Find a book specific to your state.... that’s what you’ll be tested on.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Concise to read
customer_reviews.text: This book is very concise in each chapter. It provides information knowledge and practice questions. It’s very nice to start on if you planning to take RE exam.
customer_reviews.author: JamieZ

customer_reviews.title: I passed my real estate exam on the first try
customer_reviews.text: I passed my real estate exam on the first try . I highly recommend this book and Travis Everette on YouTube .
customer_reviews.author: Tonya L.

customer_reviews.title: No CD
customer_reviews.text: I'm still studying from this book but it came without the CD!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lawrie

product_meta.title: Real Estate Licensing Exams with Online Digital Flashcards (Barron's Test Prep)
